item.description:
TAX SEASON IS HERE!
Everyone dislikes paying taxes, but did you ever stop to think about why Americans have became so taxed and how the Federal Income Tax and the IRS came to be?

We will watch the widely distributed 2006 independent documentary America: Freedom to Fascism by Aaron Russo, which alleges among a variety of claims that income tax is illegal.

The film's claims about the illegality of the income tax in the United States have been critiqued as factually incorrect by some reviewers. The film has, however, developed a strong following. We will watch this film to start our discussion.

RECOMMENDED BOOKS:
"Constitutional Income: Do You Have Any?" by Phil Hart
"Cracking the Code" by Peter Hendrickson

As always tasty organic snacks will be served.

IMPORTANT NOTE: Freedom Is Fundamental Book Club and Discussion Group is NOT advocating that people not pay taxes or refuse to file tax returns.

group.name: FREEDOM IS FUNDAMENTAL Book Club and Discussion Group

item.name: FREE FILM America: From Freedom to Fascism
